alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:22PM EDT until June 01 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CHAMPAIGN...NORTHWESTERN CLARK...NORTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY AND SOUTHEASTERN MIAMI COUNTIES... At 622 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tipp City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Huber Heights, Vandalia, Tipp City, New Carlisle, Northridge, Enon, Brown, Christiansburg, North Hampton, Tremont City, Donnelsville, Green Meadows, Ginghamsburg, Thackery, Phoneton, Terre Haute, Grayson and Dialton. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 35 and 56. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 63 and 69. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
